tool_description: LOVE-aas (Love As A Service) provides a modern, RESTful, scalable solution to the common problem spreading the love. Love As A Service was build out of love, as an answer to the Fuck Off As A Service Project
name: Love As A Service
title: Love As A Service

api_list.name: /crush/:to/:from
api_list.description: Will return content in the form I can't keep it in anymore, :to. I have a HUGE crush on you! --:from
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-love-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com/crush/Cary/Alicia"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-love-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-love-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com/crush/{to}/{is_from}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-love-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
